.. _`design_system_components_objectsearch`:

ObjectSearch
============

.. figure:: images/component_objectsearch.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Object Search component that allows to search and select objects inline with help of the Enterprise Search. Users can select one or multiple tokens to search objects of a specific class. Addtionally they can search and select from their history and favorites.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.objectwidgets.ObjectSearch.__module__`
